auth_confirm_email_alert: [IS] Check your email for the confirmation link!
auth_google_popup_message: [IS] To complete sign-in, please continue in the new tab.
auth_google_popup_link: [IS] Click here to sign in with Google
role_entrepreneur_desc: [IS] I have an idea and want to turn it into a real business. I need guidance, planning, and help finding investors.
role_investor_desc: [IS] I'm looking for investment opportunities in new startups. I want to discover exciting projects and connect with entrepreneurs.
role_programmer_desc: [IS] I'm a programmer or freelancer looking to find startup projects and contribute to innovative product development.
role_consultant_desc: [IS] I'm a business consultant or specialist who wants to share my expertise with startups and help them grow.
role_designer_desc: [IS] I'm a UI/UX designer who wants to work on startup products and create beautiful, user-friendly interfaces.
role_save_error: [IS] Error saving information. Please try again.
role_change_later: [IS] Don't worry! You can change your role later in settings.
